com.optimizely.ab.bucketing

Interface UserProfileService


  • public interface UserProfileService
    Class encapsulating user profile service functionality. Override with your own implementation for storing and retrieving the user profile.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String experimentBucketMapKey
      The key for the decisions Map.
      static java.lang.String userIdKey
      The key for the user ID.
      static java.lang.String variationIdKey
      The key for the variation Id within a decision Map.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> lookup(java.lang.String userId)
      Fetch the user profile map for the user ID.
      void save(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> userProfile)
      Save the user profile Map sent to this method.

    • Field Detail

      • userIdKey

        static final java.lang.String userIdKey
        The key for the user ID. Returns a String.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • experimentBucketMapKey

        static final java.lang.String experimentBucketMapKey
        The key for the decisions Map. Returns a Map<String, Map<String, String>>.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • variationIdKey

        static final java.lang.String variationIdKey
        The key for the variation Id within a decision Map.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • lookup

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> lookup(java.lang.String userId)
                                                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Fetch the user profile map for the user ID.
        Parameters:
        userId - The ID of the user whose profile will be retrieved.
        Returns:
        a Map representing the user's profile. The returned Map<String, Object> of the user profile will have the following structure. { userIdKey : String userId, decisionsKey : Map<String, Map<String, String>> decisions { String experimentId : Map<String, String> decision { variationIdKey : String variationId } } }
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Passes on whatever exceptions the implementation may throw.

      • save

        void save(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> userProfile)
   throws java.lang.Exception
        Save the user profile Map sent to this method.
        Parameters:
        userProfile - The Map representing the user's profile.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Can throw an exception if the user profile was not saved properly.
